publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7801 Ted Brocklebank: Congratulations to The Illusionist—That the Parliament congratulates The Illusionist on receiving an Oscar nomination in the Best Animated Feature Film category at the 83rd Academy Awards; recognises that the movie was created in an Edinburgh film studio set up in 2004; appreciates the boost to tourism that the film will bring due to it being set in Edinburgh; welcomes the publicity that it gave to Edinburgh as the opening feature at the Edinburgh International Film Festival 2010; appreciates the encouragement that this nomination will give to those in the film industry in Scotland, and hopes that it emerges victorious at the ceremony, scheduled to be held on 27 February 2011. Supported by: Nanette Milne*, Cathy Peattie*, Bill Kidd*, Bill Aitken*, Jamie McGrigor*, John Lamont*, Tricia Marwick*, Stewart Maxwell*, Jackson Carlaw*, Robin Harper*, Hugh Henry*, Rob Gibson*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-7801 Congratulations to The Illusionist (lodged on 26 January 2011) Dave Thompson*, Murdo Fraser*, Sandra White*, Mary Scanlon*, Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-7801 Ted Brocklebank: Congratulations to The Illusionist—That the Parliament congratulates The Illusionist on receiving an Oscar nomination in the Best Animated Feature Film category at the 83rd Academy Awards; recognises that the movie was created in an Edinburgh film studio set up in 2004; appreciates the boost to tourism that the film will bring due to it being set in Edinburgh; welcomes the publicity that it gave to Edinburgh as the opening feature at the Edinburgh International Film Festival 2010; appreciates the encouragement that this nomination will give to those in the film industry in Scotland, and hopes that it emerges victorious at the ceremony, scheduled to be held on 27 February 2011. Supported by: Nanette Milne, Cathy Peattie, Bill Kidd, Bill Aitken, Jamie McGrigor, John Lamont, Tricia Marwick, Stewart Maxwell, Jackson Carlaw, Robin Harper, Hugh Henry, Rob Gibson, Kenneth Gibson, Dave Thompson, Murdo Fraser, Sandra White, Mary Scanlon, Jamie Hepburn, Joe FitzPatrick*, Linda Fabiani*
S3M-7801 Congratulations to The Illusionist (lodged on 26 January 2011) Margaret Mitchell*
S3M-7801 Congratulations to The Illusionist (lodged on 26 January 2011) Liam McArthur*
S3M-7801 Congratulations to The Illusionist (lodged on 26 January 2011) Maureen Watt*
S3M-7801 Congratulations to The Illusionist (lodged on 26 January 2011) Irene Oldfather*
S3M-7801 Congratulations to The Illusionist (lodged on 26 January 2011) Stuart McMillan*
